main.name: Francis Decena
main.occupation: Full Stack Web Developer & Founder of Creativo Rare
main.bio: My name is Francis, I'm a Full Stack Web Developer. Currently I'm working full time at IPS Securex as Senior Software Developer and also I'm a freelancer.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information and Technology

skills1.name: React JS
skills1.description: I have used many different database systems and I am better educated and experienced with Relational Databases. However, for many applications, the ease of use of MongoDB better suits my needs and it is much more enjoyable to work with.

skills1.name: Mongo DB
skills1.description: I have used many different database systems and am better educated and experienced with Relational Databases. However, for many applications, the ease of use of MongoDB better suits my needs and it is much more enjoyable to work with

skills1.name: Node JS
skills1.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice. The bulk of my experience with it has been in conjunction with MeteorJS-based projects

skills1.name: Bootstrap 4
skills1.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

skills1.name: Heroku
skills1.description: I use Heroku as my hosting platform for most of my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

skills1.name: Git
skills1.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in small teams and have toyed around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

projects.title: MERN Stack WhatsApp Clone
projects.category: WhatsApp Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

projects.title: MERN Stack TikTok Clone
projects.category: TikTok Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
